channel.title: Matrix 719 How can i make myself admin?
channel.description:
Hi,
My matrix works now, but how can i make myself admin or owner?
- Wout

item.title: Matrix 719 How can i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @JZombie37 JZombie37
item.description:
@JZombie37 wrote:

If you using the Thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,552456.0.html
Delete your server, Because that has a backdoor in it.
OT: Go to - Src > com > rs > game > player > Player.java
Search if (username.equalsIgnoreCase
Once you search it should take you too if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("aname"))
Replace “aname” or whatever with your in-game name, Make sure you leave the 2 “” 's
Enjoy

Read full topic
item.source: Matrix 719 How can i make myself admin?
